subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which famous fort is located in Jaipur?
question_hi: जयपुर में कौन सा कुमारी है?
explanation_en:
Amber Fort, also known as Jaigarh Fort, is a famous monument located in Jaipur, Rajasthan.
